activities: Sutherland receives personal data transferred from the EU to the US as a Data Processor on behalf of our clients, who act as the Data Controller. All information is owned and controlled by our clients. Processes performed by Sutherland on behalf of the client are pursuant to the instructions of that client.

recoursemech: Consumer or Sutherland employee complaints will generally be escalated internally to the Sutherland corporate legal department which will consult with management on appropriate response or action depending on the facts at issue. In the event that Sutherland is unable to resolve a complaint to the consumer or employee's satisfaction, Sutherland will direct the employee or consumer to contact local authoritative bodies (including the European Data Protection Authorities).
